name: Hamming AI
headline: Automated AI voice agent testing
description:
Humans make billions of calls/day. We think a majority of these will be handled by AI built by thousands of companies tackling every single vertical.

Making these AI voice agents reliable is hard. A small change in prompts, function call definitions, or model providers can cause large changes in LLM outputs. 

Hamming automates testing for AI voice agents. Our voice agents call your voice agent. An AI drive-through startup uses Hamming to simulate thousands of simultaneous phone calls to achieve 99.99% agent order accuracy.

We have a proven track record of helping enterprises win with AI. Sumanyu (CEO) previously helped Citizen (safety app) grow its users by 4X and grew an AI-powered sales program to 100s of millions in revenue/year at Tesla. Marius (CTO) previously ran data infrastructure @ Anduril and was a founding engineer @ Spell (MLOps startup acquired by Reddit).

founders.name: Sumanyu Sharma, Co-Founder & CEO
founders.description:
Sumanyu is the Co-Founder & CEO @ Hamming.

Previously helped Citizen grow its MAU by 4X and helped bootstrap revenue from 0 to millions in ARR in under 6 months.

Before that, grew an AI-powered sales program @ Tesla to 100s of millions in revenue/year as a Senior Staff Data Scientist.

Published a first-author paper in AI during undergrad. BASc from UWaterloo w/ dean's list.

founders.name: Marius Buleandra, Co-Founder & CTO
founders.description:
Marius is the Co-Founder & CTO @Hamming.

Previously Eng Manager for Data Infrastructure @Anduril.

Founding engineer @Spell (ML Observability & Infra startup acquired by Reddit). Worked on payments @Square and Windows Kernel Virtualization @Microsoft.

# Launch _trustworthy_ AI voice agents in weeks
**Automated AI voice agent testing** , **production call analytics** , **trust and safety reports** and more.
Test your AI voice agent against 1000s of simulated users in minutes.
## Backed by world class investors
![Hamming AI Investors](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpioneer_logo.6e7c4e5f.png&w=256&q=75)

## All-in-one experimentation platform for AI voice agents
**AI voice agents** are hard to get right. A **small change** in prompts, function call definitions or model providers can cause **large changes** in **voice agent call quality**.
We're the only end-to-end platform that supports you from **development** to**production**.
### Automated AI Voice Agent Testing
Teams currently spend hours testing their voice agents by hand. Use our [voice characters](https://hamming.ai/<https:/app.hamming.ai/voice-demo>) (see demo) to create 1000s of concurrent phone calls to your voice agents and find bugs.
Automated AI voice agent testing is 1000x more efficient than testing your voice agents by hand.
Featured in our YC launch [here.](https://hamming.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/LW9-hamming-automated-testing-for-voice-agents>)
![Automated AI Voice Agent Testing](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fautomated-voice-testing.2314c564.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Prompt Management
For B2B teams, each of your customers requires a slightly different prompt.
You can store, manage, version and keep your prompts synced with voice infra providers from Hamming.
Featured in our YC launch [here.](https://hamming.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/LHa-hamming-make-your-rag-ai-agents-reliable>)
![Prompt Management](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fprompt-management.d913b15f.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Prompt Optimizer & Playground
Writing prompts by hand is slow and tedius. Use our [prompt optimizer](https://hamming.ai/<https:/app.hamming.ai/prompt-optimizer>) (free to try) to automatically generate optimized prompts for your LLM.
Use our prompt playground to test LLM outputs on a dataset of inputs. Our LLM judges the quality of generated outputs. Save 80% of manual prompt engineering effort.
Featured in our YC launch [here.](https://hamming.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/L4V-hamming-let-ai-optimize-your-prompts-free-for-7-days>)
![Prompt Optimizer & Playground](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fprompt-playground.e5ffbfe4.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Production Call Analytics
Go beyond passive monitoring. We actively track and score how users are using your AI app in production and flag cases using LLM judges that need your attention.
Easily convert calls and traces into test cases and add them to your golden dataset.
Featured in our YC launch [here.](https://hamming.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/LHa-hamming-make-your-rag-ai-agents-reliable>)
![Production Call Analytics](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fonline-evals.8692ba12.png&w=1920&q=75)
## Trusted by AI-forward enterprises
![Shelden Shi](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fsheldon-testimonial.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Shelden Shi
Co-Founder & CTO @ Lilac Labs
We automate the person taking orders at the drive-thru with voice. **Order accuracy is extremely critical** for our customers. Getting an order wrong (i.e., missing allergies) means significant financial loss.
Hamming's automated AI voice agent testing helps us **simulate 1000s of customer calls** (dietary restrictions, allergies, large group orders, etc.) and find gaps in our system in minutes. This gives us a huge peace of mind and clarity on where we need to improve.
Hamming is an essential part of our infra that **directly unlocks revenue.**
[ Read Case Study](https://hamming.ai/</case-studies/lilac-labs>)
![Yossi Eliyahu](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fyossi.a9e7e2f6.jpg&w=96&q=75)
Yossi Eliyahu
VP of Engineering @ Fora
There are a lot of low quality AI apps out there. We care a lot about quality. Hamming helps us launch accurate, robust and resilient AI apps that our users love.
![Lilac Labs - AI Drive Thru](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsheldenshi.7271614f.png&w=96&q=75)
Lilac Labs - AI Drive Thru
Shelden Shi, Co-Founder & CTO, Lilac Labs
Before Hamming, testing our AI voice agents felt like a full-time job. Now, we catch bugs like handling allergies or noisy environments without lifting a finger.
![Mia - 24/7 Auto Dealership](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fkelvinpho.fadf8b7f.png&w=96&q=75)
Mia - 24/7 Auto Dealership
Kelvin Pho, Co-Founder and CTO, Mia
Every update to Mia used to come with anxiety about what might break. Thanks to Hamming, we can confidently roll out changes knowing they've been automatically tested across all scenarios.
![Podium - 24/7 AI Employees](https://hamming.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjordanfarnworth.4d50bf8c.png&w=96&q=75)

## Automated AI voice agent testing and production call analytics
We're experts in supporting companies tackling **high-stakes domains** where **making mistakes** leads to **high churn** or **regulatory consequences.**
Our customers use Hamming to automatically test and improve both **inbound** and **outbound** AI voice agents.
AI Appointment Scheduling
Build reliable AI intake agents that handle scheduling, cancellations, and rescheduling with confidence.
Hamming simulates thousands of booking scenarios to test your agent's ability to:
  * Handle complex calendar conflicts
  * Process cancellations and reschedules
  * Verify appointment details accurately
  * Manage multiple time zones


AI Drive-through
Deploy reliable AI voice drive-through agents that handle complex orders with precision.
Hamming stress-tests your agent across scenarios including:
  * Dietary restrictions and allergies
  * Complex modifications and substitutions
  * Background noise and accent variations
  * High-volume rush hour conditions


AI Customer Support
Launch 24/7 AI voice support agents that consistently deliver high-quality customer service.
Hamming validates your agent's ability to:
  * Resolve common customer issues
  * Handle emotional conversations
  * Escalate appropriately to human agents
  * Maintain compliance standards


AI Phone Followups
Ensure your AI follow-up agents deliver critical healthcare information accurately and empathetically.
Hamming tests your agent's proficiency in:
  * Prescription reminders and instructions
  * Appointment confirmation workflows
  * HIPAA-compliant communication
  * Emergency escalation protocols


AI Personal Assistant
Develop versatile AI personal assistants that manage daily tasks efficiently and reliably.
Hamming ensures your assistant can:
  * Rebook flights and manage travel itineraries
  * Schedule and organize appointments
  * Handle diverse task requests seamlessly
  * Adapt to varying user preferences and workflows


AI Coaching and Tutoring
Create AI personal coaching agents that effectively teach and guide students towards their goals.
Hamming evaluates your coaching agents by:
  * Simulating diverse learning scenarios
  * Assessing the clarity and accuracy of explanations
  * Measuring engagement and responsiveness
  * Ensuring adaptability to individual learning styles


## Our agents call your agent
Our voice agents are trained to mimic human conversations, including accents, background noise, and pauses.
For each call, we automatically score the call quality and provide detailed analytics.

Our AI voice agents can call your agents in any language, including English, French, German, Hindi, Spanish, Italian, and more.

Built for teams building AI voice agents
## Trustworthy AI voice agents made simple
Building reliable AI voice agents is a team effort. Hamming is built to support cross-team collaboration.
AI Engineer
Save 100s of hours weekly of manually testing voice agents. Easily perform one-off voice call debugging, get clear explanations for each conversation score, and use 24/7 monitoring to track call quality in production.
AI Research
Run voice agent experiments at scale to optimize accuracy and performance across different scenarios and user populations.
Product
Track voice agent performance metrics and conduct detailed analytics to drive user satisfaction and retention.
Domain Expert
Create comprehensive voice interaction test cases and maintain quality datasets. Deploy voice agents with confidence.
![ML Engineer](https://hamming.ai/_next/static/media/persona1.024859c9.svg)
Mark
ML Engineer
I can simulate thousands of voice conversations with different accents, background noise levels, and user scenarios in minutes. The detailed reports help me quickly identify where my voice agent needs improvement.
![Data Scientist](https://hamming.ai/_next/static/media/persona2.b9b57424.svg)
Julia
Data Scientist
I can understand exactly why certain voice conversations score poorly and quickly iterate on our conversation design to improve quality.
![Product Engineer](https://hamming.ai/_next/static/media/persona3.1fbb918a.svg)
Victor
Product Engineer
This is like Optimizely for building AI voice agents. I can quickly test new ideas and iterate on my voice agent design.
![DevOps Engineer](https://hamming.ai/_next/static/media/persona4.819366af.svg)
Sarah
DevOps Engineer
We catch regressions before they reach users by automatically testing our voice agents.
### Voice Scenarios
Create diverse voice scenarios with different accents, background noise levels, and user behaviors to test your AI voice agents thoroughly.
### Voice Experiment Tracking
Track hypotheses and results for each voice agent experiment. Measure improvements in accuracy, latency, and call completion.
### Score Override
Override AI conversation scores to align with your quality standards. Each override helps train the AI judge to better evaluate voice interactions.
### Production Call Analytics
Search and analyze voice conversations to understand why your AI agent responded in a particular way. Identify patterns in successful and failed interactions.
### Sampling
Run multiple tests of the same scenario to understand performance variations. Identify and fix flaky interactions before they reach users.
### Team Collaboration
Share voice datasets, test results, and conversation traces with your team. Collaborate to improve voice agent performance across all scenarios.
## Frequently Asked Questions
### FAQs
## What is AI voice agent testing? Why do I need it?
Current voice agents are notoriously hard to test. Teams currently spend hours testing these agents on a limited number of test cases.
We spin up 1000s of parallel test calls to your voice agent and give you detailed reports on where your agent is struggling. This is more scalable, systematic and rigorous than human vibe checks - where a human manually goes through a set of questions to assess quality.
Our AI based voice agent testing is 1000x faster and 20x cheaper than using humans.
## Are you HIPAA compliant?
Hamming is HIPAA compliant.
## Do you just test the voice piece or the conversational LLM flow as well?
We test both voice and conversational aspects of your system.
For voice, we test your system's ability to handle long pauses, interruptions and background noises.
For conversational flows, we test your system's ability to handle complex conversations and an array of personas.
## What metrics do you use measure voice and conversational quality? Can I define my own metrics?
We routinely build bespoke metrics for customers in unique domains.
You can also define your own metrics and use them for both testing your voice agents in dev and prod.
## How does Hamming integrate with existing LLM frameworks or voice infrastructure?
See our [Python SDK](https://hamming.ai/<https:/pypi.org/project/hamming-sdk/>) and [Typescript SDK](https://hamming.ai/<https:/www.npmjs.com/package/@hamming/hamming-sdk>). Integration is ~30 lines of code.
We're agnostic to any framework, LLMs, or voice infrastructure.
## Who is Hamming for?
Our platform is built for teams. We help folks from engineering, product and domain experts to collaborate and build reliable AI voice agents quickly.
We're experts in supporting companies tackling high-stakes domains where getting the wrong answer leads to high churn or regulatory consequences.
Our customers use Hamming to build retentive AI products in their industry.
## Can I self-host Hamming?
We offer on-premise deployment for enterprises who want greater control over security and data handling. By default, we offer a SaaS platform to decrease time to value.
## Use any LLM, agent and voice infra providers
### We provide platform-agnostic hooks to simulate conversations, evaluate and log your traces.

# Launch _trustworthy_ AI voice agents in weeks
**Automated AI voice agent testing** , **production call analytics** , **trust and safety reports** and more.
Test your AI voice agent against 1000s of simulated users in minutes.

## All-in-one experimentation platform for AI voice agents
**AI voice agents** are hard to get right. A **small change** in prompts, function call definitions or model providers can cause **large changes** in **voice agent call quality**.
We're the only end-to-end platform that supports you from **development** to**production**.
### Automated AI Voice Agent Testing
Teams currently spend hours testing their voice agents by hand. Use our voice characters⟨7⟩ (see demo) to create 1000s of concurrent phone calls to your voice agents and find bugs.
Automated AI voice agent testing is 1000x more efficient than testing your voice agents by hand.
Featured in our YC launch here.⟨19⟩
![Automated AI Voice Agent Testing⟨20⟩]
### Prompt Management
For B2B teams, each of your customers requires a slightly different prompt.
You can store, manage, version and keep your prompts synced with voice infra providers from Hamming.
Featured in our YC launch here.⟨21⟩
![Prompt Management⟨22⟩]
### Prompt Optimizer & Playground
Writing prompts by hand is slow and tedius. Use our prompt optimizer⟨23⟩ (free to try) to automatically generate optimized prompts for your LLM.
Use our prompt playground to test LLM outputs on a dataset of inputs. Our LLM judges the quality of generated outputs. Save 80% of manual prompt engineering effort.
Featured in our YC launch here.⟨24⟩
![Prompt Optimizer & Playground⟨25⟩]
### Production Call Analytics
Go beyond passive monitoring. We actively track and score how users are using your AI app in production and flag cases using LLM judges that need your attention.
Easily convert calls and traces into test cases and add them to your golden dataset.
Featured in our YC launch here.⟨21⟩
![Production Call Analytics⟨26⟩]
## Trusted by AI-forward enterprises
![Shelden Shi⟨27⟩]
### Shelden Shi
Co-Founder & CTO @ Lilac Labs
We automate the person taking orders at the drive-thru with voice. **Order accuracy is extremely critical** for our customers. Getting an order wrong (i.e., missing allergies) means significant financial loss.
Hamming's automated AI voice agent testing helps us **simulate 1000s of customer calls** (dietary restrictions, allergies, large group orders, etc.) and find gaps in our system in minutes. This gives us a huge peace of mind and clarity on where we need to improve.
Hamming is an essential part of our infra that **directly unlocks revenue.**

## Automated AI voice agent testing and production call analytics
We're experts in supporting companies tackling **high-stakes domains** where **making mistakes** leads to **high churn** or **regulatory consequences.**
Our customers use Hamming to automatically test and improve both **inbound** and **outbound** AI voice agents.
AI Appointment Scheduling
Build reliable AI intake agents that handle scheduling, cancellations, and rescheduling with confidence.
Hamming simulates thousands of booking scenarios to test your agent's ability to:
  * Handle complex calendar conflicts
  * Process cancellations and reschedules
  * Verify appointment details accurately
  * Manage multiple time zones


AI Drive-through
Deploy reliable AI voice drive-through agents that handle complex orders with precision.
Hamming stress-tests your agent across scenarios including:
  * Dietary restrictions and allergies
  * Complex modifications and substitutions
  * Background noise and accent variations
  * High-volume rush hour conditions


AI Customer Support
Launch 24/7 AI voice support agents that consistently deliver high-quality customer service.
Hamming validates your agent's ability to:
  * Resolve common customer issues
  * Handle emotional conversations
  * Escalate appropriately to human agents
  * Maintain compliance standards


AI Phone Followups
Ensure your AI follow-up agents deliver critical healthcare information accurately and empathetically.
Hamming tests your agent's proficiency in:
  * Prescription reminders and instructions
  * Appointment confirmation workflows
  * HIPAA-compliant communication
  * Emergency escalation protocols


AI Personal Assistant
Develop versatile AI personal assistants that manage daily tasks efficiently and reliably.
Hamming ensures your assistant can:
  * Rebook flights and manage travel itineraries
  * Schedule and organize appointments
  * Handle diverse task requests seamlessly
  * Adapt to varying user preferences and workflows


AI Coaching and Tutoring
Create AI personal coaching agents that effectively teach and guide students towards their goals.
Hamming evaluates your coaching agents by:
  * Simulating diverse learning scenarios
  * Assessing the clarity and accuracy of explanations
  * Measuring engagement and responsiveness
  * Ensuring adaptability to individual learning styles


## Our agents call your agent
Our voice agents are trained to mimic human conversations, including accents, background noise, and pauses.
For each call, we automatically score the call quality and provide detailed analytics.

## Trustworthy AI voice agents made simple
Building reliable AI voice agents is a team effort. Hamming is built to support cross-team collaboration.
AI Engineer
Save 100s of hours weekly of manually testing voice agents. Easily perform one-off voice call debugging, get clear explanations for each conversation score, and use 24/7 monitoring to track call quality in production.
AI Research
Run voice agent experiments at scale to optimize accuracy and performance across different scenarios and user populations.
Product
Track voice agent performance metrics and conduct detailed analytics to drive user satisfaction and retention.
Domain Expert
Create comprehensive voice interaction test cases and maintain quality datasets. Deploy voice agents with confidence.
![ML Engineer⟨43⟩]
Mark
ML Engineer
I can simulate thousands of voice conversations with different accents, background noise levels, and user scenarios in minutes. The detailed reports help me quickly identify where my voice agent needs improvement.
![Data Scientist⟨44⟩]
Julia
Data Scientist
I can understand exactly why certain voice conversations score poorly and quickly iterate on our conversation design to improve quality.
![Product Engineer⟨45⟩]
Victor
Product Engineer
This is like Optimizely for building AI voice agents. I can quickly test new ideas and iterate on my voice agent design.
![DevOps Engineer⟨46⟩]
Sarah
DevOps Engineer
We catch regressions before they reach users by automatically testing our voice agents.
### Voice Scenarios
Create diverse voice scenarios with different accents, background noise levels, and user behaviors to test your AI voice agents thoroughly.
### Voice Experiment Tracking
Track hypotheses and results for each voice agent experiment. Measure improvements in accuracy, latency, and call completion.
### Score Override
Override AI conversation scores to align with your quality standards. Each override helps train the AI judge to better evaluate voice interactions.
### Production Call Analytics
Search and analyze voice conversations to understand why your AI agent responded in a particular way. Identify patterns in successful and failed interactions.
### Sampling
Run multiple tests of the same scenario to understand performance variations. Identify and fix flaky interactions before they reach users.
### Team Collaboration
Share voice datasets, test results, and conversation traces with your team. Collaborate to improve voice agent performance across all scenarios.
## Frequently Asked Questions
### FAQs
## What is AI voice agent testing? Why do I need it?
Current voice agents are notoriously hard to test. Teams currently spend hours testing these agents on a limited number of test cases.
We spin up 1000s of parallel test calls to your voice agent and give you detailed reports on where your agent is struggling. This is more scalable, systematic and rigorous than human vibe checks - where a human manually goes through a set of questions to assess quality.
Our AI based voice agent testing is 1000x faster and 20x cheaper than using humans.
## Are you HIPAA compliant?
Hamming is HIPAA compliant.
## Do you just test the voice piece or the conversational LLM flow as well?
We test both voice and conversational aspects of your system.
For voice, we test your system's ability to handle long pauses, interruptions and background noises.
For conversational flows, we test your system's ability to handle complex conversations and an array of personas.
## What metrics do you use measure voice and conversational quality? Can I define my own metrics?
We routinely build bespoke metrics for customers in unique domains.
You can also define your own metrics and use them for both testing your voice agents in dev and prod.
## How does Hamming integrate with existing LLM frameworks or voice infrastructure?
See our Python SDK⟨47⟩ and Typescript SDK⟨48⟩. Integration is ~30 lines of code.
We're agnostic to any framework, LLMs, or voice infrastructure.
## Who is Hamming for?
Our platform is built for teams. We help folks from engineering, product and domain experts to collaborate and build reliable AI voice agents quickly.
We're experts in supporting companies tackling high-stakes domains where getting the wrong answer leads to high churn or regulatory consequences.
Our customers use Hamming to build retentive AI products in their industry.
## Can I self-host Hamming?
We offer on-premise deployment for enterprises who want greater control over security and data handling. By default, we offer a SaaS platform to decrease time to value.
## Use any LLM, agent and voice infra providers
### We provide platform-agnostic hooks to simulate conversations, evaluate and log your traces.

generated_description:
**Hamming AI: Revolutionizing Automated Voice Agent Testing**

**Overview**: Founded in 2024 as part of Y Combinator’s Batch S24, Hamming AI is on a mission to make AI voice agents reliable through automated testing. The company was born out of the observation that humans make billions of calls daily, and as AI technology matures, a majority of these calls will eventually be handled by AI systems built by countless companies across various sectors.

**The Challenge**: Ensuring the reliability of AI voice agents is no small feat. Even minor adjustments in prompts or configurations can significantly affect the performance of large language models (LLMs), leading to variability in outputs. Hamming AI addresses this challenge by simulating call scenarios directly between voice agents, providing an essential layer of testing and validation.

**What They Do**: Hamming automates the process of testing AI voice agents, allowing users to simulate thousands of concurrent phone calls in mere minutes. For instance, their collaboration with an AI drive-through startup has led to achieving an impressive accuracy rate of 99.99% in order fulfillment through rigorous testing.

**Leadership Team**: The brains behind Hamming AI are Sumanyu, the CEO, and Marius, the CTO. Sumanyu has a proven track record, having previously helped Citizen grow its user base significantly and generating hundreds of millions in revenue through an AI-driven sales program at Tesla. Marius brings deep technical expertise from his previous roles at Anduril and as a founding engineer at Spell, a prominent MLOps startup acquired by Reddit.

**Funding and Partnerships**: Hamming AI has successfully raised $3.8 million in seed funding aimed at improving the reliability of AI voice interactions. They're backed by a raft of reputable investors and are already helping enterprises navigate the complexities of AI deployment.

**Product Offerings**:
1. **Automated AI Voice Agent Testing**: Hamming's platform empowers teams to run thousands of parallel calls to their AI agents, dramatically speeding up the testing process and enhancing accuracy.
  
2. **Prompt Management**: Businesses can efficiently manage and sync diverse prompts tailored for different users and use cases.

3. **Prompt Optimizer & Playground**: The platform offers tools for generating optimized prompts and testing LLM outputs to enhance usability and performance.

4. **Production Call Analytics**: Beyond mere testing, Hamming provides analytic tools to assess how voice agents perform in real-world scenarios, enabling proactive issue resolution.

5. **Multi-Scenario Testing**: Hamming can simulate varied high-stakes environments—be it restaurant orders, healthcare follow-ups, or customer service—all while adhering to regulatory standards like HIPAA.

**Customer Success**: Hamming AI is trusted by enterprises in critical sectors. Clients have lauded the service for its effectiveness in enhancing order accuracy, managing operational risks, and rolling out AI-driven updates confidently.

**Conclusion**: By streamlining the testing of AI voice agents, Hamming AI stands poised to become an indispensable ally for companies venturing into AI-driven communication. The future of voice technology is here, and it's automated. Check out more about Hamming at [hamming.ai](https://hamming.ai).
